subject: Self Care
title: The Five Components of EQ
description: Learn The Five Components of EQ in one minute.

hook.text: Emotional intelligence sounds vague until you break it into five concrete, learnable skills.

buildup.text: Self-awareness, self-regulation, motivation, empathy, and social skills. Those are the five pillars.

discovery.text: Each pillar builds on the previous. You can't regulate what you don't notice, and you can't empathize unfocused.

twist.text: Most people think EQ is about being nice. It's actually about being accurate â€” reading situations correctly.

climax.text: Developing EQ is systematic, not mystical. Strengthen one pillar at a time and the others improve naturally.

punchline.text: Five skills. All learnable. Start with awareness.

quiz.question: Which is NOT one of the five components of emotional intelligence?
